__e: Our lives have been hard, sir. Our stepfather was a brute.
Straight from the shoulders. Do you hear me?
- Oh, I know. Why don't you translate, and I'll wave the gun around?
Yes, we got somebody who can translate, but you gotta remain calm.
If we really have had this conversation, I probably pointed out... ..there's no way I can translate this in less than a day.
You just cost us the one person who could translate it. Your resignation is accepted.
